bibl.title: Sappho the Sorceress - Another Look at fr. 1 (LP).
bibl.note: Supplements some of the leading analyses of Sappho, fr. 1 (LP) (especially the fifth and sixth strophes) and reformulates the question, what role does magical incantation play in the poem as a whole?
bibl.seg: PETROPOULOS J.C.B., Sappho the Sorceress - Another Look at fr. 1 (LP).
Supplements some of the leading analyses of Sappho, fr. 1 (LP) (especially the fifth and sixth strophes) and reformulates the question, what role does magical incantation play in the poem as a whole?
